title: Cardano’s DeFi Boom: A Look at the Top DeFi Projects on Cardano
description: The Cardano ($ADA) ecosystem has made significant advancements in the decentralized finance (DeFi) market, as its DeFi ecosystem —which went live in January 2022 with the launch of the MuesliSwap mainnet— has grown from $50.9 million in the first quarter of 2023 to over $150 million, a year-to-date growth of over 200%. Top DeFi Projects […]
